title: How to Beat Hard Demons in Geometry Dash

steps.title: Enter practice mode through the pause menu and complete a "practice run" through the whole level.
steps.content: Enter practice mode through the pause menu and complete a "practice run" through the whole level. Take note of the more difficult parts of the level, so you know which ones may need some more practice.

steps.title: Try to get a personal copy of the level.
steps.content: Try to get a personal copy of the level. The creator might have wrote down the password to copy the level in the level's description. Another way is to search for a 'copy-able' version of the level.

steps.title: If you are unable to get a copy of the level, it is fine.
steps.content: If you are unable to get a copy of the level, it is fine. You can still use practice mode on the level. In fact, disabling "Auto Checkpoints" in the pause settings and manually placing checkpoints can simulate using start positions in a copy of the level quite well. The only drawback is that you will not be able to hear the level's original music.

steps.title: If you are able to get a copy of the level, go to 'Create' tab and go into the level editor for that Demon.
steps.content: If you are able to get a copy of the level, go to 'Create' tab and go into the level editor for that Demon. From there, you have access to tools that can help with easier practice.

steps.title: Search for and select the 'Start Pos' within the editor.
steps.content: Search for and select the 'Start Pos' within the editor. Place it at the part of the level that you need to practice or you feel is the most difficult.

steps.title: Enter normal mode and keep practicing.
steps.content: Enter normal mode and keep practicing. Practice until you feel confident that you are able to complete that part.

steps.title: Practice the other parts of the level.
steps.content: Practice the other parts of the level. Practice 'easy' parts too as they might catch you off guard.

steps.title: If you're feeling confident that you are able to complete the Demon, try it!
steps.content: If you're feeling confident that you are able to complete the Demon, try it! Let your practice pay off.

steps.title: Do not be let down by failures!
steps.content: Do not be let down by failures! If you cannot pass a certain part, then go into practice mode or your copy of the level and practice.

steps.title: Watch other people's gameplay and see how they complete it.
steps.content: Watch other people's gameplay and see how they complete it. Try to compare it with yours. If you notice any difference and you crash there, correct it. Make yourself used to doing it the correct way.
